text: In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a 7", Single Rock style cover for the Art Rock album "I Get Along Without You Very Well / Prayer" by Durutti Column* from 1983
In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a VHS, Advance, PAL Rock style cover for the Avantgarde album "When The World" by Durutti Column* from 1987
In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a CD, Single, Promo Electronic style cover for the Ambient album "Together Mix" by Durutti Column* from 1991
